title: This is what customers say about Kiewie
content: You can try our service for one month for free â€” completely without obligation. Want more information about our approach and terms? Sign up now!

reviews.name: Patrick Stooker
reviews.review: When we started our company, we knew we had a unique concept, but we didn't know exactly which target audience fit this concept. After a few weeks with Kiewie, we suddenly had a clear picture of our target audience and quickly managed to attract a few major clients!

reviews.name: Thomas de Goeij
reviews.review: The platform that Kiewie has developed is very powerful and targeted. It has brought our compact vending machines to the attention with email campaigns that had a higher conversion rate than we ever expected.

reviews.name: Patrick van Echtelt
reviews.review: As a startup, it was especially difficult to make ourselves known to companies that were eligible for our service. By using Kiewie, we were able to significantly accelerate that process.
